purpose: LUT School of Engineering Sciences is announcing a job opening for a Professor in Artificial Intelligence for Software Engineering. The position is available at the Department of Software Engineering, which focuses on software development, digital transformation, and user-centered design. Candidates are expected to have research expertise in AI related to software engineering, with responsibilities including education, research, and administrative duties. The application process is open until 11 August 2025, and further details can be found in the provided links.
